topic.title: INTRAVENOUS INFUSION OF GLUCOSE AND ELECTROLYTE SOLUTION RECEIVED INDICATOR
topic.shortdesc: For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care, INTRAVENOUS INFUSION OF GLUCOSE AND ELECTROLYTE SOLUTION RECEIVED INDICATOR indicates whether the baby received an intravenous infusion of glucose and electrolyte solution on the NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE DAILY CARE DATE.
